member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE
member.summary: Defines gestures recognized by Direct Manipulation.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_BEGIN
member.summary: Marks the beginning of an interaction.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE_MANIPULATION
member.summary: A compound gesture that supports translation, rotation and scaling.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE_GESTURE_CROSS_SLIDE
member.summary: Select or move through slide or swipe gestures.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_END
member.summary: Marks the end of an interaction.
